subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: As a native Clevelander and a lifelong die-hard fan of the Indians, the Browns and the Cavaliers, what’s left of my heart goes out to the fans of St. Louis.
snippet: As a native Clevelander and a lifelong die-hard fan of the Indians, the Browns and the Cavaliers, what’s left of my heart goes out to the fans of St. Louis.
